tasks.title: Frontend Project Initialization
tasks.description: Set up the frontend project structure using Vite with React 18+ and TypeScript
tasks.details: Create a new frontend project using Vite with TypeScript template. Install core dependencies: react-router-dom, @reduxjs/toolkit, react-redux, framer-motion, react-hook-form, yup, tailwindcss, axios. Configure package.json with fixed versions (no carets/tildes). Create tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled.

subtasks.title: Create Vite React TypeScript Project
subtasks.description: Initialize new Vite project with React and TypeScript template
subtasks.details: Run 'npm create vite@latest linkup-frontend -- --template react-ts' and set up basic project structure

subtasks.title: Install Core Dependencies
subtasks.description: Install all required frontend dependencies with fixed versions
subtasks.details: Install react-router-dom, @reduxjs/toolkit, react-redux, framer-motion, react-hook-form, yup, tailwindcss, axios with exact versions (no carets/tildes)

subtasks.title: Configure TypeScript Strict Mode
subtasks.description: Set up tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled
subtasks.details: Configure TypeScript with strict mode, proper path mapping, and optimal settings for React development

subtasks.title: Setup Project Folder Structure
subtasks.description: Create organized folder structure following PRD specifications
subtasks.details: Create components/, pages/, store/, types/, utils/, services/, assets/ folders with proper organization

tasks.title: Backend Project Initialization
tasks.description: Set up the backend project structure using Node.js 18+ with TypeScript and Express
tasks.details: Initialize Node.js project with TypeScript. Install dependencies: express, prisma, @prisma/client, cors, dotenv, passport, passport-linkedin-oauth2, jsonwebtoken, bcrypt. Create .nvmrc file with v18. Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode.

tasks.title: Database Schema Design with Prisma
tasks.description: Initialize Prisma and define the complete database schema
tasks.details: Set up Prisma with PostgreSQL. Define all models: User, LinkedinProfile, WorkExperience, DatingProfile, UserPhoto, Swipe, Match, Message. Create enums and relationships. Run initial migration.

tasks.title: LinkedIn Developer App Setup
tasks.description: Create LinkedIn Developer Application and obtain OAuth credentials
tasks.details: Register application in LinkedIn Developer Portal. Configure OAuth 2.0 with scopes: r_liteprofile, r_emailaddress. Set up redirect URLs. Obtain Client ID and Client Secret.

tasks.title: LinkedIn OAuth Integration Backend
tasks.description: Implement Passport.js LinkedIn strategy for OAuth authentication
tasks.details: Configure Passport.js with LinkedIn OAuth strategy. Implement /auth/linkedin and /auth/linkedin/callback routes. Handle OAuth flow and JWT generation.
